sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Base from "./Base"; import getProducts from "./helper/Coreapicalls"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { API } from "../Backend"; import ImageHelper from "./helper/Image"; const Product = () => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); const [error, setError] = useState(false); const { productId } = useParams(); const [sproduct, setSproduct] = useState({ price: 0, clicked:false, atc:1, }); const {price,clicked,atc} =sproduct; const getProduct = () => { return fetch(`${API}product/${productId}/`, { method: "GET" }) .then((Response) => { return Response.json(); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }; const loadProduct = () => { getProduct().then((data) => { if (data && data.error) { console.log(error); } else { setSproduct(data); } }); }; const loadallProducts = () => { getProducts().then((data) => { if (data && data.error) { setError(data.error); console.log(error); } else { setProducts(data); } }); }; const handlerforprice = (name)=> (event) => { setSproduct({...sproduct,clicked:true,[name]:Number(price)+150}) } const handlerforatc = (name) => (event) => { let natc=atc setSproduct({...sproduct,[name]:atc}) } useEffect(() => { loadallProducts(); loadProduct(); getProduct(); }, []); return (
{/*---- Include the above in your HEAD tag --------*/}
